Description: Switch off the MotoSuiveur® cabinet (The MotoSuiveur®s should be driven manually)
Dismantle the worm cover of the MS
Mount the manual handle on the MS
Repeat steps 1 to 4 of the previous procedure

The operator n°1 opens the service brake step by step (to allow the lowering of the load by gravity without exceeding a certain speed, in which case the MS blocks). Meanwhile, the other operator n°2 should follow the movement by rotating the handle
